DOC.brief_title: An HPV Vaccine Provider Intervention Safety Net Clinics
DOC.detailed_description: In study investigator utilize Community Based Participatory Research approach combination previous ongoing research , patient provider education material available professional organization , qualitative information obtain provider in-depth interview parent/daughter focus group develop provider intervention encourage receipt HPV vaccine , appropriate cancer screen African Americans Hispanics . A focus study formation Community Advisory Board ( CAB ) provide input development modification provider intervention . Safety net clinic Nashville Memphis serve intervention site , Chattanooga Nashville ( Meharry ) serve control site . Mothers child intervention sit view 5-minute video exam room visit type see provider , receive information sheet list suggest question ask provider . Mothers child control sit receive usual care . The select study site identify cervical cancer screen priority area base need assessment conduct part Meharry Medical College Community Health Center-Community Network Program ( CHC-CNP ) . The investigator conduct pre- post-intervention quantitative survey mother child evaluate whether provider intervention effective improve HPV vaccination coverage , cervical cancer screen rate . The investigator abstract medical record indicate HIPAA privacy form . After conduct pre- post-intervention survey abstract medical record , investigator find increase HPV vaccine uptake require intensive , multicomponent intervention .
